data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 173,995 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bangui, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Bangui, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Bangui prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Bangui.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Fulani, Nigerian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Fulani, Nigerian people.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Bangui to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Bangui against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bangui who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Bangui
location.people_groups_list: Dagba, Banda-Bambari, Linda, Banda, Togbo-Vara, Vale, Kpagua
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dagba (39,000), Banda-Bambari, Linda (251,000), Banda, Togbo-Vara (17,000), Vale (7,500), Kpagua (4,900)
